Fri Dec 29 15:40:45 PST 2017

Happy Holidays!

  * QIF; make sure to include FX conversion when generating QIF output
  * Add Menu item "Save" to allow user to save current list of symbols.

unzip hleOfxQuotes-gui-Build_20171229_167.zip
  to get
hleOfxQuotes-gui-Build_20171229_167-exec.jar

Need Java 1.8

java -jar hleOfxQuotes-gui-Build_20171229_167-exec.jar

I did a simple test using the following symbols for ft.com

FTSE:FSI
BARC:LSE
AMZN:NSQ/USD/GBP
USDGBP

The quote source prices are

AMZN:NSQ	Amazon.com Inc	865.1739 USD	12/29/2017	01:00PM
BARC:LSE	Barclays PLC	2.7453 GBX	12/29/2017	04:35AM
FTSE:FSI	FTSE 100 Index	10391.6869 GBP	12/29/2017	04:35AM

When saving to QIF, the converted prices will be

!Type:Prices
"AMZN:NSQ",865.1739,"12/29'2017",,,
"BARC:LSE",2.7453,"12/29'2017",,,
"FTSE:FSI",10391.6869,"12/29'2017",,,

In log file 'hleOfxQuotes-log.txt', you should see the folowing log entries

2017-12-29 16:39:24,620 [AWT-EventQueue-0] INFO  com.hungle.msmoney.core.fx.FxTableUtils - FX - symbol=AMZN:NSQ, fromCurrency=USD, toCurrency=GBP, rate=0.7398
2017-12-29 16:39:24,620 [AWT-EventQueue-0] INFO  com.hungle.msmoney.core.fx.FxTableUtils - FX - Converting price for symbol=AMZN:NSQ, qsPrice=1169.47, price=865.173906
2017-12-29 16:39:24,620 [AWT-EventQueue-0] INFO  com.hungle.msmoney.core.fx.FxTableUtils - FX - symbol=BARC:LSE, fromCurrency=GBX, toCurrency=GBP, rate=0.01
2017-12-29 16:39:24,620 [AWT-EventQueue-0] INFO  com.hungle.msmoney.core.fx.FxTableUtils - FX - symbol=BARC:LSE, fromCurrency=GBP, toCurrency=USD, rate=1.3517166801838334
2017-12-29 16:39:24,620 [AWT-EventQueue-0] INFO  com.hungle.msmoney.core.fx.FxTableUtils - FX - Converting price for symbol=BARC:LSE, qsPrice=203.1, price=2.7453365774533656
2017-12-29 16:39:24,620 [AWT-EventQueue-0] INFO  com.hungle.msmoney.core.fx.FxTableUtils - FX - symbol=FTSE:FSI, fromCurrency=GBP, toCurrency=USD, rate=1.3517166801838334
2017-12-29 16:39:24,620 [AWT-EventQueue-0] INFO  com.hungle.msmoney.core.fx.FxTableUtils - FX - Converting price for symbol=FTSE:FSI, qsPrice=7687.77, price=10391.686942416869
